entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of drizzle. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
